Package jetbrains.mps.openapi.editor.cells

Interface EditorFontMetrics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorFontMetricsImpl
    public interface EditorFontMetrics
    Implementations of this interface shell provide access to the information about associated font dimensions in a platform-independent way.

    User: shatalin Date: 8/13/19

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getDescent()
      Determines the font descent of the associated font.
      int getHeight()
      Gets the standard height of a line of text in associated font.
      int getWidth​(char ch, int count)
      Returns the total advance width for showing the text representing count subsequent ch characters in this font.
      int getWidth​(String text)
      Returns the total advance width for showing the specified text in this font.
      int getWidth​(String text, int beginIndex, int endIndex)
      Returns the total advance width for showing the specified text fragment in this font.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Gets the standard height of a line of text in associated font. This is the distance between the baseline of adjacent lines of text.
        Returns:
        the standard height of associated font.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth​(String text)
        Returns the total advance width for showing the specified text in this font. The advance is the distance from the leftmost point to the rightmost point on the string's baseline.
        Parameters:
        text - text to be measured
        Returns:
        the advance width of the specified text in this font

      • getWidth

        int getWidth​(char ch,
             int count)
        Returns the total advance width for showing the text representing count subsequent ch characters in this font. The advance is the distance from the leftmost point to the rightmost point on the string's baseline.
        Parameters:
        ch - character
        count - number of characters
        Returns:
        the advance width of the specified text in this font

      • getWidth

        int getWidth​(String text,
             int beginIndex,
             int endIndex)
        Returns the total advance width for showing the specified text fragment in this font. The advance is the distance from the leftmost point to the rightmost point on the string's baseline.
        Parameters:
        text - text to be measured
        beginIndex - start index of text fragment to measure
        endIndex - end index of text fragment to measure
        Returns:
        the advance width of the specified text fragment in this font
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if text is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the beginIndex and endIndex arguments index characters outside the bounds of the text string.

      • getDescent

        int getDescent()
        Determines the font descent of the associated font. The font descent is the distance from the font's baseline to the bottom of most alphanumeric characters with descenders.
        Returns:
        the font descent of the the associated font.
